title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 21 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 21 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: The king shall joy in thy strength, O LORD; and in thy salvation how greatly shall he rejoice!
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，王必因你的能力欢喜。因你的救恩，他的快乐何其大。

lineList.en: Thou hast given him his heart's desire, and hast not withholden the request of his lips. Selah.
lineList.cn: 他心里所愿的，你已经赐给他。他嘴唇所求的，你未尝不应允。（细拉）

lineList.en: For thou preventest him with the blessings of goodness: thou settest a crown of pure gold on his head.
lineList.cn: 你以美福迎接他，把精金的冠冕戴在他头上。

lineList.en: He asked life of thee, and thou gavest it him, even length of days for ever and ever.
lineList.cn: 他向你求寿，你便赐给他，就是日子长久，直到永远。

lineList.en: His glory is great in thy salvation: honour and majesty hast thou laid upon him.
lineList.cn: 他因你的救恩大有荣耀。你又将尊荣威严加在他身上。

lineList.en: For thou hast made him most blessed for ever: thou hast made him exceeding glad with thy countenance.
lineList.cn: 你使他有洪福，直到永远。又使他在你面前欢喜快乐。

lineList.en: For the king trusteth in the LORD, and through the mercy of the most High he shall not be moved.
lineList.cn: 王依靠耶和华，因至高者的慈爱必不摇动。

lineList.en: Thine hand shall find out all thine enemies: thy right hand shall find out those that hate thee.
lineList.cn: 你的手要搜出你的一切仇敌。你的右手要搜出那些恨你的人。

lineList.en: Thou shalt make them as a fiery oven in the time of thine anger: the LORD shall swallow them up in his wrath, and the fire shall devour them.
lineList.cn: 你发怒的时候，要使他们如在炎热的火炉中。耶和华要在他的震怒中吞灭他们。那火要把他们烧尽了。

lineList.en: Their fruit shalt thou destroy from the earth, and their seed from among the children of men.
lineList.cn: 你必从世上灭绝他们的子孙，从人间灭绝他们的后裔。

lineList.en: For they intended evil against thee: they imagined a mischievous device, which they are not able to perform.
lineList.cn: 因为他们有意加害于你。他们想出计谋，却不能作成。

lineList.en: Therefore shalt thou make them turn their back, when thou shalt make ready thine arrows upon thy strings against the face of them.
lineList.cn: 你必使他们转背逃跑，向他们的脸搭箭在弦。

lineList.en: Be thou exalted, LORD, in thine own strength: so will we sing and praise thy power.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，愿你因自己的能力显为至高。这样，我们就唱诗，歌颂你的大能。
